verses.text: Now the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* drew \w nigh|strong="H7126"\w* that he should \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; and he \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,
I \w go|strong="H1980"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: be thou \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* therefore, and shew thyself a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*;

And \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and his \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and his \w testimonies|strong="H5715"\w*, as it is \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, that thou mayest \w prosper|strong="H7919"\w* in all that thou \w doest|strong="H6213"\w*, and whithersoever thou \w turnest|strong="H6437"\w* thyself:\f + \fr 2.3 \ft prosper: or, do wisely\f*

That the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* may \w continue|strong="H6965"\w* his \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* concerning me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, If thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to their \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me in \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* with all their \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* and with all their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, there shall not \w fail|strong="H3772"\w* thee (\w said|strong="H0559"\w* he) a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* on the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 2.4 \ft fail…: Heb. be cut off from thee from the throne\f*

Moreover thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* also what \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to me, \add and\add* what he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, unto \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*, and unto \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jether|strong="H3500"\w*, whom he \w slew|strong="H2026"\w*, and \w shed|strong="H7760"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* upon his \w girdle|strong="H2290"\w* that \add was\add* about his \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*, and in his \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w* that \add were\add* on his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.\f + \fr 2.5 \ft shed: Heb. put\f*

\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* therefore according to thy \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, and let not his hoar \w head|strong="H7872"\w* go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

But \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* unto the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Barzillai|strong="H1271"\w* the \w Gileadite|strong="H1569"\w*, and let them be of those that \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* at thy \w table|strong="H7979"\w*: for so they \w came|strong="H7126"\w* to me when I \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.

And, behold, \add thou hast\add* with thee \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gera|strong="H1617"\w*, a \w Benjamite|strong="H1145"\w* of \w Bahurim|strong="H0980"\w*, which \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* me with a \w grievous|strong="H4834"\w* \w curse|strong="H7045"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when I \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Mahanaim|strong="H4266"\w*: but he came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* me at \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and I \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* to him by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I will not put thee to \w death|strong="H4191"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.\f + \fr 2.8 \ft grievous: Heb. strong\f*

Now therefore hold him not \w guiltless|strong="H5352"\w*: for thou \add art\add* a \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* what thou oughtest to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto him; but his hoar \w head|strong="H7872"\w* bring thou \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w* with \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.
So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

And the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add were\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*: \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* he in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* he in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ Then \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*; and his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* was \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*.

¶ And \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Haggith|strong="H2294"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Bath-sheba|strong="H1339"\w* the \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*. And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Comest|strong="H0935"\w* thou \w peaceably|strong="H7965"\w*? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Peaceably|strong="H7965"\w*.
He \w said|strong="H0559"\w* moreover, I have somewhat to \w say|strong="H1697"\w* unto thee. And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Say \w on|strong="H1696"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* that the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w* was mine, and \add that\add* all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* on me, that I should \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*: howbeit the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w* is turned \w about|strong="H5437"\w*, and is become my \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w*: for it was his from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And now I \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w petition|strong="H7596"\w* of thee, \w deny|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* not. And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Say \w on|strong="H1696"\w*.\f + \fr 2.16 \ft deny…: Heb. turn not away my face\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Speak|strong="H0559"\w*, I pray thee, unto \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, (for he will not \w say|strong="H7725"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w* \w nay|strong="H7725"\w*,) that he \w give|strong="H5414"\w* me \w Abishag|strong="H0049"\w* the \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.
And \w Bath-sheba|strong="H1339"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Well|strong="H2896"\w*; I will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* for thee unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

¶ \w Bath-sheba|strong="H1339"\w* therefore \w went|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto him for \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* her, and \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* himself unto her, and sat \w down|strong="H3427"\w* on his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, and caused a \w seat|strong="H3678"\w* to be \w set|strong="H7760"\w* for the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*; and she \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* on his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*.

Then she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w desire|strong="H7592"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w petition|strong="H7596"\w* of thee; \add I pray thee\add*, \w say|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* not \w nay|strong="H7725"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, Ask \w on|strong="H7592"\w*, my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*: for I will not \w say|strong="H7725"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w* \w nay|strong="H7725"\w*.

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let \w Abishag|strong="H0049"\w* the \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w* be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, And why dost thou \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w Abishag|strong="H0049"\w* the \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w* for \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w*? \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* for him the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w* also; for he \add is\add* mine \w elder|strong="H1419"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*; even for him, and for \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and for \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*.

Then \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* so to me, and more \w also|strong="H3254"\w*, if \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* have not \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* this \w word|strong="H1697"\w* against his own \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

Now therefore, \add as\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, which hath \w established|strong="H3559"\w* me, and \w set|strong="H3427"\w* me on the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and who hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* me an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, as he \w promised|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* shall be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*; and he \w fell|strong="H6293"\w* upon him that he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ And unto \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w Get|strong="H3212"\w* thee to \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*, unto thine own \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*; for thou \add art\add* \w worthy|strong="H0376"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w*: but I will not at this \w time|strong="H3117"\w* put thee to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, because thou \w barest|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and because thou hast been \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* in all wherein my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* was \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w*.\f + \fr 2.26 \ft worthy…: Heb. a man of death\f*

So \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* thrust \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* from being \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; that he might \w fulfil|strong="H4390"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* concerning the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* in \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*.

¶ Then \w tidings|strong="H8052"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*: for \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* had \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w*, though he \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* not \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*. And it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* that \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* was \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* unto the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and, behold, \add he is\add* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*. And \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, Come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Nay; but I will \w die|strong="H4191"\w* here. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* as he hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, and \w fall|strong="H6293"\w* upon him, and \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* him; that thou mayest take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w innocent|strong="H2600"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, which \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w*, from me, and from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon his own \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, who \w fell|strong="H6293"\w* upon \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* more \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* and \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than he, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* them with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* not \w knowing|strong="H3045"\w* \add thereof, to wit\add*, \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*, \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jether|strong="H3500"\w*, \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

Their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall therefore \w return|strong="H7725"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, and upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: but upon \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and upon his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, and upon his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and upon his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, shall there be \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

So \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w fell|strong="H6293"\w* upon him, and \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him: and he was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* in his room over the \w host|strong="H6635"\w*: and \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* did the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* in the room of \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w*.

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* for \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Build|strong="H1129"\w* thee an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* there, and go not \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* thence any \w whither|strong="H0575"\w*.

And \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, The \w saying|strong="H1697"\w* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: as my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, so will thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*. And \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w* his \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w* to \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: and \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* from \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*.
